Dow Jones Industrial Stock Price Index for US
```{r}
library('quantmod')
library('rvest')
library('pbapply')
library('Quandl')
library('TTR')
library('dygraphs')
library('lubridate')
library('tidyquant')
library('timetk')

dji <- getSymbols("DJI",src="yahoo", from = "2011-01-01", auto.assign = FALSE) #import dow jones 
weighted_index <- getSymbols("DTWEXBGS",src="FRED", from = "20011-01-01", auto.assign = FALSE) #import trade weighted 

head(weighted_index)
